column1: '''Eldamar''' was the land of the [[Elves]] in [[Aman]], which encompassed the [[Calacirian]], the coastal area east of the [[Pelóri]], and [[Tol Eressëa]].  The main settlements of the Elves in this region were [[Tirion]], [[Alqualondë]], and [[Avallónë]].<ref>{{S
